T02TD1906E:21b-1: bisha da pa da sam gra ho n'a ma pra tishth'a bi dhi /
T02TD1906E:21b-3: rgya che ba'i tshig bsdus pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas pa'i tsho ga /
T02TD1906E:21b-4: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1906E:21b-5: dbang po'i mtshon gyis rnam pa mtshungs //
T02TD1906E:21b-6: mchog tu dga' bas mdzes pa yi //
T02TD1906E:21b-7: shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa //
T02TD1906E:21b-9: btud nas k'a tsar mngon brjod pas //
T02TD1906E:21b-10: sna tshogs slob dpon bzhed rig cing //
T02TD1906E:21b-11: sna tshogs rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD1906E:21b-12: rgyas shing sal bas 'jigs rnams la //
T02TD1906E:21b-13: nyung zhing gsal ba'i rjes 'brangs pa /
T02TD1906E:21b-14: de la shes rab ldan pa dag //
T02TD1906E:21b-15: bde blag 'jug par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1906E:21b-16: rab gnas cho ga brjod par bya //
T02TD1906E:21b-17: sku gzugs rab gnas ma byas la //
T02TD1906E:21b-18: mchod dang phyag 'tshal gsol ba ni //
T02TD1906E:21b-19: sngags kyis dman pa'i sbyin sreg gi //
T02TD1906E:21b-20: thal ba 'bras med ji bzhin no //
T02TD1906E:21b-21: rab tu mi gnas chos rnams la //
T02TD1906E:21b-22: 'dir ni gang du rab gnas ni //
T02TD1906E:21b-24: rgyal ba rnams kyis rab gnas gsungs //
T02TD1906E:21b-25: gang du sku gzugs grub nas ni //
T02TD1906E:21b-26: yun ring gnas shing ma mchod pa //
T02TD1906E:22a-2: der ni legs pa ma yin 'byung //
T02TD1906E:22a-3: rtag tu cho ga ma tshang pa'i //
T02TD1906E:22a-4: rab gnas bya ba smad pa nyid //
T02TD1906E:22a-7: de phyir dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1906E:22a-9: cho ga'i bya ba'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1906E:22a-10: rab tu 'bad de bya ba nyid //
T02TD1906E:22a-11: zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang //
T02TD1906E:22a-12: tshes ni bdun du bstan pa nyid //
T02TD1906E:22a-13: rab gnas las la nges bstan pa //
T02TD1906E:22a-14: rgyud skar rnams ni bcu bzhi'o //
T02TD1906E:22a-15: dgun tha dpyid ra dpyid tha dang //
T02TD1906E:22a-17: gza' ni phur bu lhag pa dang //
T02TD1906E:22a-18: pa sangs bzhi pa zla pa'o //
T02TD1906E:22a-19: tshes ni lnga dang bdun nyid dang //
T02TD1906E:22a-20: de bzhin gnyis dang bcu pa dang //
T02TD1906E:22a-21: gsum pa dang ni zla ba nya //
T02TD1906E:22a-22: bcu gsum rnams te bdun po bzang //
T02TD1906E:22a-23: rgyal dang me bzhi lha mtshams dang //
T02TD1906E:22a-24: snar ma dang ni gro bzhin mgo / smad dang snron dang snubs dang lag //
T02TD1906E:22a-25: khrums dang de bzhin chu stong do //
T02TD1906E:22a-26: skar ma slad la rab gnas bya //
T02TD1906E:22a-28: nam yang yid la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1906E:22a-29: dngos grub tu ni me bzhis 'gyur //
T02TD1906E:22a-30: lung rnams yongs su shes pa ni /
T02TD1906E:22a-31: snubs dang gro bzhin gyis yin no //
T02TD1906E:22a-32: lag la skal ba bzang por 'gyur //
T02TD1906E:22a-34: ri dags mgo yis zhi bar bstan //
T02TD1906E:22a-35: chu stod kyis ni bu rnams 'tsho //
T02TD1906E:22a-36: khrums kyis yang dag 'phel bar bshad //
T02TD1906E:22a-37: rgyal gyis rtag tu rgyal ba'o //
T02TD1906E:22a-38: snron la dge dang skal ba bzang//
T02TD1906E:22a-39: lha mtshams kyis ni mchog rab ster //
T02TD1906E:22a-40: yang dag skar ma dang mthun pas //
T02TD1906E:22a-41: ji skad bshad pa thams cad byang //
T02TD1906E:22a-42: gsum pa bdun pa drug pa dang //
T02TD1906E:22a-43: bcud dang bcu gcig zla ba rnams //
T02TD1906E:22a-44: dang po lnga pa gsum pa dang //
T02TD1906E:22a-45: tha ma yang ni rnam par spang //
T02TD1906E:22a-46: dgu dang brgyad dang bcu gnyis gnyis //
T02TD1906E:22a-47: bzhi dang lnga dang barsham nyid //
T02TD1906E:22a-48: rnam pa gzhan du byed pa la //
T02TD1906E:22a-50: sems can dman pa'i dbang mdzad nas //
T02TD1906E:22a-51: zla ba la sogs bzang pa 'di'o //
T02TD1906E:22a-52: mchog gi dbang du mdzad nas ni //
T02TD1906E:22a-53: nges pa nyid ni rigs ma yin //
T02TD1906E:22b-0: / dbyar ni dngos @22b grub gnas su 'gyur //
T02TD1906E:22b-1: ston ka rnal 'byor spyin pa nyid //
T02TD1906E:22b-2: dgun stod sangs rgyas ye shes ster //
T02TD1906E:22b-3: dgun smad 'byor pa kun sbyin byed //
T02TD1906E:22b-4: dpyid ni phun sum tshogs rab ster //
T02TD1906E:22b-5: sos ka rgyal dang zhib pa ster //
T02TD1906E:22b-6: dus rnams kun du sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD1906E:22b-7: rab tu gnas la bzhugs par 'dod//
T02TD1906E:22b-8: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du yang //
T02TD1906E:22b-9: rtag tu gtsug tor bcing par bya //
T02TD1906E:22b-10: rtag tu sbyin sreg dgang bar bya //
T02TD1906E:22b-11: rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD1906E:22b-12: rtag tu sangs rgyas rab gnas bya //
T02TD1906E:22b-13: grub par gyur pa de'i mod la //
T02TD1906E:22b-14: rab tu gnas ba mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD1906E:22b-15: mi bdag dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur //
T02TD1906E:22b-16: thob pa 'di la the tshom med //
T02TD1906E:22b-17: 'di la gza' dang rgyu skar med //
T02TD1906E:22b-18: bgegs dang log 'dren dgag kyang med //
T02TD1906E:22b-19: gang zhig yid la ci 'dod pa //
T02TD1906E:22b-20: skye shing skye bar grub par 'gyur //
T02TD1906E:22b-21: bsrung dang dbang bskur gtor ma bzlas dang dbye ba dang //
T02TD1906E:22b-22: phyir bzlog pa dang dkyil 'khor dang ni sgrub thabs dang //
T02TD1906E:22b-23: btsan thags sbyor pa dang ni gshegs su gsol ba rnams //
T02TD1906E:22b-24: sangs rgyas rnams kyis de nyid bcu zhes rab tu gsungs //
T02TD1906E:22b-25: slob dpon de nyid 'di dag rig //
T02TD1906E:22b-27: sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga shes //
T02TD1906E:22b-28: rab tu gnas pa bya bar 'os //
T02TD1906E:22b-29: de nas khrus dang gtsang sgra'i bdag / rab tu gnas pa byed brtson pa'i //
T02TD1906E:22b-30: slob mas mandala me tog bcas //
T02TD1906E:22b-31: thal mos bla mar gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1906E:22b-32: bdag ni gzhan rnams thams cad kun //
T02TD1906E:22b-33: rab tu bsgral bar 'dod ba yis //
T02TD1906E:22b-34: bgyis pa dang ni bris pa yi //
T02TD1906E:22b-35: sku gzugs ras ris glegs pa ma dag / ji ltar nus dang rjes mthun pas //
T02TD1906E:22b-37: dgyes pa'i thugs ni kun bskyed nas //
T02TD1906E:22b-38: bdag gi rab gnas mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1906E:22b-39: de ltar don du gnyer nas ni //
T02TD1906E:22b-40: shes rab pha rol phyin legs pa ltas//
T02TD1906E:22b-41: bdag gis dad pas shes rab kyi //
T02TD1906E:22b-42: pha rol phyin pa 'bum pa bris //
T02TD1906E:22b-43: gang yang dge la rab 'bad pas //
T02TD1906E:22b-44: srung ba lnga la sogs pa bris //
T02TD1906E:22b-45: 'bum bu gleng pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1906E:22b-46: ras ris 'bad pas bris byas shing //
T02TD1906E:22b-47: rgyal pa'i bzhugs gnas mchog gyur pa //
T02TD1906E:23a-2: rgyal pa'i sku gdung dag gi ni //
T02TD1906E:23a-3: mchod rten bdag gis legs par bsgrubs //
T02TD1906E:23a-4: sangs rgyas gnas kyi tshul du ni //
T02TD1906E:23a-5: dri yi gtsang khang 'bad pas bgyis //
T02TD1906E:23a-6: khron pa kun dga' ra ba dang //
T02TD1906E:23a-7: byug pa'i sku gzugs la sogs dang //
T02TD1906E:23a-8: sangs rgyas kyis ni mang gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1906E:23a-9: lugs ma sogs la rab tu 'bad //
T02TD1906E:23a-10: sems can rnams ni tshim byed pa'i //
T02TD1906E:23a-11: rdzing bu yid du 'od ba bgyis //
T02TD1906E:23a-12: sems can thams ni bde byed pa'i //
T02TD1906E:23a-13: dzam bh'a li ni yongs rdzogs bgyis //
T02TD1906E:23a-14: dar ba'i blo dan slob ma yi //
T02TD1906E:23a-15: dang por gus pas lan gsum gsol //
T02TD1906E:23a-16: slob ma dag par shes nas ni //
T02TD1906E:23a-17: stegs bu yang dag brtsam bar bya //
T02TD1906E:23a-18: grub bzhi pa la khru bzhi pa //
T02TD1906E:23a-19: dpangs kyi tshad ni khru gnyis pa //
T02TD1906E:23a-20: chu shing ka ba sogs ldan pa //
T02TD1906E:23a-21: nyams dga' cho ga bzhin byas nas //
T02TD1906E:23a-22: der ni stan 'jam bde ba la //
T02TD1906E:23a-23: blo bzang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin //
T02TD1906E:23a-24: gtsug tor bcings shing lus chas bzang //
T02TD1906E:23a-25: cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1906E:23a-26: dbang po rdo rje can ni 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas //
T02TD1906E:23a-27: gtor ma phul tu byung pa 'di bzhes shig / me dang gshin rje bden bral 'byung po'i bag / chu bdag rlung dang nor gyi bdag po dang //
T02TD1906E:23a-28: dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang //
T02TD1906E:23a-29: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02TD1906E:23a-30: lha rnams kun dang gang dag sa steng glu //
T02TD1906E:23a-31: ri yi lha dang gtsang pa'i tshogs bcas la //
T02TD1906E:23a-32: so so so sor phul pa 'di bzhes la //
T02TD1906E:23a-33: rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas kyang //
T02TD1906E:23a-34: rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun bcas //
T02TD1906E:23a-35: nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu //
T02TD1906E:23a-36: gtor ma me tog bdug pa phul ba 'di //
T02TD1906E:23a-37: dgyes par gsol zhing bsnams te bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD1906E:23a-38: bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02TD1906E:23a-39: rab gnas rtsa ba bkra shis dang //
T02TD1906E:23a-40: dag pa'i chu yi khrus nyid de //
T02TD1906E:23a-41: bum pa lhag par gnas pa ni //
T02TD1906E:23a-42: mtshan nyid ldan pa nyid du bshad //
T02TD1906E:23a-43: de dag grangs ni bcu dgu ru //
T02TD1906E:23a-44: sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis bshad //
T02TD1906E:23a-45: de dag nyid dang mnyam pa shad pa //
T02TD1906E:23a-46: las kun phyed dang nyi shu'o //
T02TD1906E:23a-47: yang na ji ltar 'byor pa dang //
T02TD1906E:23b-0: bum pa rnams kyi nang @23b na ni ;
T02TD1906E:23b-1: / rnam par rgyal pa'i mtshan nyid ldan //
T02TD1906E:23b-2: sor mo bdun gyi tshad kyis ni //
T02TD1906E:23b-3: mgul ba mtho zhing rnam par mdzes //
T02TD1906E:23b-4: mchu 'phyang ba ni sor gnyis so //
T02TD1906E:23b-5: lto ldir mtho ni lnga pa can //
T02TD1906E:23b-6: gal te tshad 'dis dman gyur na //
T02TD1906E:23b-7: sbyin bdag la ni shis pa min //
T02TD1906E:23b-8: bam gyi yi ge las btung pa'i //
T02TD1906E:23b-10: gzhan la nges pa yod min te //
T02TD1906E:23b-11: med na ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1906E:23b-12: 'brul dang rin chen sman snying po //
T02TD1906E:23b-13: rigs kyi mtshan mas rnam par mdzes //
T02TD1906E:23b-14: nas dang gro dang so ba mchog //
T02TD1906E:23b-15: til dang srang mar mngon brjod pa'o //
T02TD1906E:23b-16: mu tig dngul dang gser zhes bya //
T02TD1906E:23b-17: mya men dang ni bye ru rnams //
T02TD1906E:23b-18: kanda ka ri bri ha sti //
T02TD1906E:23b-19: de bzhin sa ha de ba dang //
T02TD1906E:23b-20: gzhan gyis mi thub dkar po dang //
T02TD1906E:23b-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1906E:23b-23: sna tshogs rdo rjer rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1906E:23b-24: blo dang ldan pas kha dog lnga //
T02TD1906E:23b-25: yang dag ldan par shes par bya //
T02TD1906E:23b-26: mi bskyod pa yi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1906E:23b-27: nag po rtse mo lnga dang ldan //
T02TD1906E:23b-28: 'khor lo dkar po rtsi bas brgyad pa //
T02TD1906E:23b-29: rnam par snang mdzad mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1906E:23b-30: rin chen 'byung ldan mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1906E:23b-31: rin chen magrad cha dgu pa //
T02TD1906E:23b-32: 'od dpag med kyi mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1906E:23b-34: de bzhin don yod ral gri ni //
T02TD1906E:23b-35: kha dog sngo bsangs 'od zer bcas //
T02TD1906E:23b-36: spyan ma yi ni spyan zur dag //
T02TD1906E:23b-37: mdog sngon mig 'bras bzang po can //
T02TD1906E:23b-38: m'a ma k'i ni rdo rje sngo //
T02TD1906E:23b-41: sgrol ma'i yin par rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1906E:23b-42: de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje ma'i //
T02TD1906E:23b-43: mtshan ma me long dri med dkar //
T02TD1906E:23b-44: rab mdzes pi wang sngon po ni //
T02TD1906E:23b-45: de bzhin sgra yi rdo rje ma //
T02TD1906E:23b-46: de bzhin dri yi rdo rje ma'i //
T02TD1906E:23b-48: ro yi rdo rje ma'i mtshan ma //
T02TD1906E:23b-50: de bzhin reg bya rdo rje ma'i /
T02TD1906E:23b-51: mtshan ma kha dog gis brgyan gos //
T02TD1906E:23b-52: chos kyi dbyings ma'i mtshan min //
T02TD1906E:23b-53: de bzhin mdog dkar grub gsum pa'o //
T02TD1906E:23b-54: gshin rje'i dgra yi mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1906E:23b-55: rdo rje tho ba mdog nag po //
T02TD1906E:23b-56: shes rab mthar byed kyi mtshan ma /
T02TD1906E:23b-57: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar //
T02TD1906E:23b-59: mdog dmar du ni rab tu bsgrags//
T02TD1906E:24a-0: @24a * // bgegs kyi dgra yi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1906E:24a-1: kha gdengs yang dag bstan ji bzhin //
T02TD1906E:24a-2: sna tshogs cu skyes zla dkyil la //
T02TD1906E:24a-3: gtso bo'i mtshan ma bri bar bya //
T02TD1906E:24a-4: shar sogs phyogs su gnas pa'i 'dab ma dmar 'od can //
T02TD1906E:24a-5: rlung dang me yi 'dab ma ser po'i ngo bo ste //
T02TD1906E:24a-6: yi dags bdag dang dbang ldan phyogs kyi chu skyes mdog / d'ur ba dang ni sngo bsangs sna tshogs padma'o //
T02TD1906E:24a-7: rnam snang mdzad dang lha mo bcu'i //
T02TD1906E:24a-8: dkyil 'khor sngar bzhin spro bar bya //
T02TD1906E:24a-9: gzhan ni ji ltar rigs pa bzhin //
T02TD1906E:24a-11: lnga yi phyogs la mtshan ma bzhi //
T02TD1906E:24a-12: ngos su bdag po'i gdod la bri //
T02TD1906E:24a-13: spyan ma la sogs lha mo bzhi //
T02TD1906E:24a-14: mtshan ma bum pa gcig la bri //
T02TD1906E:24a-15: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma sogs kyi //
T02TD1906E:24a-16: mtshan ma drug ni gcig la'o //
T02TD1906E:24a-17: khro bo gsum gyi mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1906E:24a-18: gcig la'o gcig ni de bzhin gcig //
T02TD1906E:24a-19: bcu yi phyogs la lha mo bzhi'i//
T02TD1906E:24a-20: mtshan ma de bzhin re re dang //
T02TD1906E:24a-21: khro bo rnams kyi so so ste /
T02TD1906E:24a-22: lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bri //
T02TD1906E:24a-23: dkar po dri yi chu yis gang //
T02TD1906E:24a-24: mgrin pa dkar ser gos dang ldan //
T02TD1906E:24a-25: aa mra'i lcug mas mdzes pa ni //
T02TD1906E:24a-26: dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD1906E:24a-28: bsams byas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1906E:24a-29: zhu ba'i rnam par yang gyur pa //
T02TD1906E:24a-30: rnam rgyal sogs la rab tu gzhug / thod pa'i steng du phreng pa'i rtser //
T02TD1906E:24a-31: rdo rje btags pa der bzhag nas //
T02TD1906E:24a-32: de nas sngags pas mtshan ma rnams //
T02TD1906E:24a-33: bdag po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla //
T02TD1906E:24a-36: aom a'a: badzra dhri ka h'um /
T02TD1906E:24a-38: aom a'a: dzi na dzika h'um /
T02TD1906E:24a-42: aom a'a: a'a ro li ka h'um /
T02TD1906E:24a-46: aom a'a: mo ha ra ti h'um spyan ma'i'o //
T02TD1906E:24a-47: aom a'a: dve sha ra ti h'um //
T02TD1906E:24a-49: aom a'a:r'a ga ra ti h'um //
T02TD1906E:24b-1: aom a'a: ya m'anta kri ta h'um /
T02TD1906E:24b-5: aom a'a: bighn'a nta kri ta h'um //
T02TD1906E:24b-6: las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni //
T02TD1906E:24b-7: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan mas mtshan //
T02TD1906E:24b-8: yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi //
T02TD1906E:24b-9: mtshan mas mtshan la de nyid kyi //
T02TD1906E:24b-10: sngags kyis lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD1906E:24b-11: bstod pa ldan ni sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1906E:24b-12: mchod pa kun gyis yang dag mchod //
T02TD1906E:24b-13: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1906E:24b-14: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa chen //
T02TD1906E:24b-15: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02TD1906E:24b-16: rdo rje dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1906E:24b-17: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che ;
T02TD1906E:24b-18: / rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po //
T02TD1906E:24b-19: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos //
T02TD1906E:24b-20: rdo rje dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1906E:24b-21: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02TD1906E:24b-22: rdor je nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02TD1906E:24b-23: rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med //
T02TD1906E:24b-24: gsang ba'i dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1906E:24b-25: rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che /
T02TD1906E:24b-26: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1906E:24b-27: rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che //
T02TD1906E:24b-28: rdo rje dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1906E:24b-29: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1906E:24b-30: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02TD1906E:24b-31: rang bzhin dag pa las byung pa //
T02TD1906E:24b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1906E:24b-33: bya ba rtsom pa thams cad la //
T02TD1906E:24b-34: blo bzang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin //
T02TD1906E:24b-35: bgegs kun nye bar zhi ched du / dang po tha mar gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1906E:24b-36: de nas lag pa g-yas brkyang la /
T02TD1906E:24b-37: nyi mar h'um yig rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1906E:24b-38: aom ma h'a badzra h'um sv'a h'a //
T02TD1906E:24b-39: cig shos la yang zla bar ni //
T02TD1906E:24b-40: aa yig rnam par bsgom par bya ;
T02TD1906E:24b-41: / aom a'a: badzra ghante a'a: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:24b-42: zhes pas byin brlabs gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1906E:24b-43: yi ge brgya ba lan bdun bzla //
T02TD1906E:24b-44: de la 'di ni yi ge brgya pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1906E:24b-45: aom badzra stva sa ma ya na nu p'a la ya //
T02TD1906E:24b-46: badzra sa tva tve no ba tishtha /
T02TD1906E:24b-48: su po shdyo me bha ga aa nu rakto me bha ba //
T02TD1906E:24b-50: sarbba karmma su tsa me tshittam shri ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'an sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytshza badzr'i bha ba //
T02TD1906E:24b-51: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva aa:/
T02TD1906E:24b-52: de ltar byas nas nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:24b-53: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1906E:25a-2: mtshan mo lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD1906E:25a-3: de nas shar du zhal phyogs pa'i //
T02TD1906E:25a-4: yang na gzhan du phyogs te gzhag / rdo rje khu tshur yungs kar bcas //
T02TD1906E:25a-5: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i sbyor pa yis //
T02TD1906E:25a-6: lan gsum nges par bskor bya zhing //
T02TD1906E:25a-7: de nas me dang chu la dor //
T02TD1906E:25a-8: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:25a-10: gser snod la sogs rnams dang ni //
T02TD1906E:25a-11: gos gzhan kaddka n'a sogs dang //
T02TD1906E:25a-12: sh'i ta li k'a la sogs dang //
T02TD1906E:25a-13: kham phor sogs kyis nges par bya //
T02TD1906E:25a-14: mchod yon la sogs bsang gtor bar //
T02TD1906E:25a-16: zangs kyi snod ni shin tu yang //
T02TD1906E:25a-17: las kun pa la rab tu shis //
T02TD1906E:25a-18: aom pra ba ra satk'a r'arghu mpra t'itshtsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:25a-19: lag pa dag kha sbyar pas dung gi mchod yon no //
T02TD1906E:25a-20: aom pra bar stkda r'a p'a dyam pra t'itshtsha sv'a h'a //
T02TD1906E:25a-21: zhes pas mthe bong mdzub mo dang bcas pa dag gis me tog gcig blangs nas 'gyid ba dang bcas pas mthe chung dang mthe bong dag bkrol bas zhabs pa sil lo //
T02TD1906E:25a-22: aom pra ba ra sa dkar r'a tsa ma ni pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a //
T02TD1906E:25a-23: mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag gis chu blangs te dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:25a-24: aom pra ba ra sdk'ar proksha nampra t'i tshatsha sv'a h'a //
T02TD1906E:25a-25: lag pas ku sha'i chun pos bsang gtor ro //
T02TD1906E:25a-26: mchod yon la sogs pa 'di thams cad rnam pa gsum du bya'o //
T02TD1906E:25a-27: bgegs dgra'i sngags kyi sbyor ldan pa'i //
T02TD1906E:25a-28: ba byung lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD1906E:25a-29: d'ur ba'i pir la sogs pa yis //
T02TD1906E:25a-30: mi bskor ba ni bkru bar bya //
T02TD1906E:25a-31: ba lang lci ba chu dang ni //
T02TD1906E:25a-32: mar dang zho dang 'o mar bcas//
T02TD1906E:25a-33: lha yi khrus ni sgrub pa la //
T02TD1906E:25a-34: ba byung lnga ru shes par bya //
T02TD1906E:25a-35: lci ba dang ni chu bor nas //
T02TD1906E:25a-36: 'o ma zho dang mar ldan pa //
T02TD1906E:25a-37: ka ra sbrang rtsir bcas pa ni //
T02TD1906E:25a-38: bdud rtsi lnga zhes 'dir brjod bya //
T02TD1906E:25a-39: au dumb'a ra shi r'i sha //
T02TD1906E:25a-41: pa ta rnams ni mdangs 'gugs phyir //
T02TD1906E:25a-42: de dag shid shun lnga zhes bya //
T02TD1906E:25a-43: de nas blo dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1906E:25a-44: dri bzang til mar sngags kyis so //
T02TD1906E:25a-45: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a //
T02TD1906E:25a-46: shing shun lnga dang dri yis kyang //
T02TD1906E:25a-47: de bzhin byugs shing nges par bkru //
T02TD1906E:25a-49: de bzhin kha che aa ka ru //
T02TD1906E:25a-50: dri lnga zhes ni rab brjod de //
T02TD1906E:25b-0: @25b lha yi khrus la brten pa yis //
T02TD1906E:25b-1: rgyal po dbang bskur tshul du ni //
T02TD1906E:25b-2: klu dang gar dang dga' ston che //
T02TD1906E:25b-3: blo ldan spyan sogs phyag bzung pa'i //
T02TD1906E:25b-4: bum pa rnams kyis sku khrus gsol //
T02TD1906E:25b-5: dang por rnam rgyal bum pas te //
T02TD1906E:25b-6: de nas rnam snang mdzad sogs kyis //
T02TD1906E:25b-7: spyan ma sogs kyis de ma thag / gshin rje'i gshed sogs bum pa yis //
T02TD1906E:25b-8: sngags pas tshigs bcad 'don zhing bya //
T02TD1906E:25b-9: dri ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1906E:25b-10: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD1906E:25b-11: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD1906E:25b-12: de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol //
T02TD1906E:25b-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um //
T02TD1906E:25b-14: ri mor bris pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1906E:25b-15: thams cad me long la chus bkru //
T02TD1906E:25b-16: rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1906E:25b-17: rdzing bu dang ni gtsug lag khang //
T02TD1906E:25b-18: dzam gha li dang dri gtsang khang //
T02TD1906E:25b-19: la sogs me long ngos la bkru //
T02TD1906E:25b-20: ras ris la ni chu med pa'i //
T02TD1906E:25b-21: gur gum byugs shing panytsa ra //
T02TD1906E:25b-22: mdangs gsal shis shing bkra ba yi //
T02TD1906E:25b-23: gos sar gyis ni yang dag dkri //
T02TD1906E:25b-24: aom badzra b'a sa se sv'a h'a //
T02TD1906E:25b-25: aom badzr'a bha ra na bh'u sha nwe sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:25b-26: chu skyes de bzhin thang las skyes //
T02TD1906E:25b-27: me tog dam pa 'di dag ni //
T02TD1906E:25b-28: bdag gis dang pas dbul lags kyi //
T02TD1906E:25b-29: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1906E:25b-31: lhan skyes de bzhin sbyar las byung //
T02TD1906E:25b-32: bdug spos dam pa 'di dag ni //
T02TD1906E:25b-33: bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi //
T02TD1906E:25b-34: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1906E:25b-35: aom a'a: badzra dhu be hum /
T02TD1906E:25b-36: lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung //
T02TD1906E:25b-37: shangs ni tshim byed dri 'di dag //
T02TD1906E:25b-38: chog tu dad pas 'bul lags kyi //
T02TD1906E:25b-39: ci bde ba ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1906E:25b-41: mun sel 'bru mar rtsi mar skyes //
T02TD1906E:25b-43: mi shes thams cad rab zhi'i slad //
T02TD1906E:25b-44: bdag nyid dad pas dbul bar bgyi //
T02TD1906E:25b-46: kha dog dri dang ro ldan zhing //
T02TD1906E:25b-47: bza' dad bca' bar yang dag ldan //
T02TD1906E:25b-48: thams cad sbyar pa'i zhal zas dag 'bul gyis yang dag bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1906E:25b-49: aom a'a: badzra nee bi dye h'um //
T02TD1906E:25b-50: rdzi dbu khron pa'i mthil son skyes //
T02TD1906E:26a-2: kun nas dag pa'i chab 'di dag /'bul gyis yang dag bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1906E:26a-4: p'u ga dz'a ti yang dag ldan //
T02TD1906E:26a-5: ga pur dang bcas tshems rtsi dag /'bul gyis yang dag bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1906E:26a-6: aom a'a: badzra m'u le h'um /
T02TD1906E:26a-7: de ltar mchod pa byas te //
T02TD1906E:26a-8: de nas sngar shad pa'i mi bskyod rdo rje la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad kyis bstod cing //
T02TD1906E:26a-9: bkra shis gang zhig la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad rnams kyis yang yang bstod par bya'o //
T02TD1906E:26a-10: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02TD1906E:26a-11: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ga gsum spangs pa //
T02TD1906E:26a-12: sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD1906E:26a-13: de yis de ring khyod la zhi byed bkra shis shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i //
T02TD1906E:26a-14: gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs pa //
T02TD1906E:26a-15: dbang bcas lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD1906E:26a-16: de yis de ring khyod la zhi byed bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig phan mdzad dam pa gtsang ma'i mchog / bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa //
T02TD1906E:26a-17: bcom ldan thub pa sh'akya seng ges gang gsungs pa //
T02TD1906E:26a-18: de yis da ring khyod la zhi byed bkra shis shog / de yis nye bar stan pa'i mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1906E:26a-19: 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD1906E:26a-20: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhe byed pa //
T02TD1906E:26a-21: 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa yin //
T02TD1906E:26a-22: dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug / mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i ngas //
T02TD1906E:26a-23: tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi //
T02TD1906E:26a-24: 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa yin //
T02TD1906E:26a-25: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis nam mkhar de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa thams cad spyan drangs te ji ltar rigs bar me tog la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1906E:26a-26: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis bstod pa byas nas mkhas pas bdud rtsi myangs te /
T02TD1906E:26b-0: zhal bsil dang t'ambula phul nas thal mo @26b sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te me tog 'thor zhing 'di skang brjod do //
T02TD1906E:26b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta su la li ta bi l'a sa na mi tee rn'a m'a mi bha ga b'antam shr'i mnydu badzr'a dyam dza:h'um bam ho:bra titstshe mam ku su m'anydza linn'a tha ho:sam ya stvam sam ya satva ham zhes so //
T02TD1906E:26b-2: de nas bdug spos thogs byas nas //
T02TD1906E:26b-3: bus mo sa gzhi la bkod de//
T02TD1906E:26b-5: tshig 'di ched du brjod par bya //
T02TD1906E:26b-6: bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog / rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1906E:26b-7: mgon po thugs brtse'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1906E:26b-8: rab tu ngas ba bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD1906E:26b-9: sems can bsod nams spel phyir dang //
T02TD1906E:26b-10: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD1906E:26b-11: bcom ldan bdag ni der gus la //
T02TD1906E:26b-12: bka' drin dag ni mdzad par 'os //
T02TD1906E:26b-13: ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
T02TD1906E:26b-14: dga' ldan du ni bzhugs ba las //
T02TD1906E:26b-15: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs pa //
T02TD1906E:26b-16: de bzhin 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD1906E:26b-17: khyim gnas rnams kyi don slad dang //
T02TD1906E:26b-18: byang chub sems ni 'phel slad du //
T02TD1906E:26b-19: me tog la sogs 'di bzhes la //
T02TD1906E:26b-20: 'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs gsol //
T02TD1906E:26b-22: dgra bcom byang chub sems rnams dang //
T02TD1906E:26b-23: gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang //
T02TD1906E:26b-24: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02TD1906E:26b-25: 'byung bo byang chub bstan ngas dang //
T02TD1906E:26b-26: sems can bstan la mngon dga' ba //
T02TD1906E:26b-27: gang su sangs rgyas spyan mnga' rnams //
T02TD1906E:26b-28: bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1906E:26b-29: bdag ni che ge rdo rje che //
T02TD1906E:26b-30: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni //
T02TD1906E:26b-31: ci nus pa yi nyer spyod kyis //
T02TD1906E:26b-32: rab tu ngas pa gyi bar 'tshal //
T02TD1906E:26b-33: sku gzugs rab tu ngas pa'i phyogs la ni //
T02TD1906E:26b-34: bsnyen pa la sogs bgyi bar 'tshal //
T02TD1906E:26b-36: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD1906E:26b-37: rjes su brtse ba nyer bzung nas //
T02TD1906E:26b-38: dam tshig dang bcas thams cad ni //
T02TD1906E:26b-39: nye bar gnas par mdzad par 'ongs //
T02TD1906E:26b-41: lugs ma la sogs pa'i sku gzugs la dang por gsol ba gdab pa gsum byas nas sgrub pa chen po'i mthar /
T02TD1906E:26b-42: lugs ma la sogs pa skad cig gis sam /
T02TD1906E:27a-0: khang pa brtsegs pa la sogs pa'i dbus su bzhugs @27a * //
T02TD1906E:27a-1: pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i bdag nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs te dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par bsams te de'i thugs ka'i sngags kyis sngar bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa yongs su gyur pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin rnams dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pas gshin rjes mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed rnams kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o /
T02TD1906E:27a-2: glegs bam dang rig sngags dang bzlas pa'i phreng ba rnams la ni gsung rdo rje ye ge'i rnam pa yongs su gyur pa'i sems dpa' gzhug go //
T02TD1906E:27a-3: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa la ni rnam par mdzad de'i rnam pa yongs su gyur pa bcug ste me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de snga ma bzhin du yi ge brgya pa yongs su bzlas bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:27a-5: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD1906E:27a-6: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02TD1906E:27a-7: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02TD1906E:27a-8: slar yang 'byor par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1906E:27a-9: aom badzra mu: zhes brjod de ji ltar rigs par gshegs su gsol bar bya'o zhes pa lha lhag par ngas pa dang /
T02TD1906E:27a-10: gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1906E:27a-12: // / de nas nyi ma gzhan la snga dro'i dus su gshegs su gsol ba ma gtogs pa ji skad bshad pa thams cad bya'o//
T02TD1906E:27a-13: de la mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02TD1906E:27a-14: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ngas pa'i //
T02TD1906E:27a-15: kshim yig dkar dang 'khor lo skyes //
T02TD1906E:27a-16: zhal dang sku mdog phyag mtshan rnams //
T02TD1906E:27a-17: rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin can //
T02TD1906E:27a-18: mig la sa yi snying por bshad //
T02TD1906E:27a-19: rna ba la ngas phyag rdo rje //
T02TD1906E:27a-20: zla bar dzi yig rdo rje ngas //
T02TD1906E:27a-22: zla bar kham dang rin chen skyes //
T02TD1906E:27a-23: nam mkha'i snying po sna yi snang //
T02TD1906E:27a-24: 'di yi zhal mdog mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1906E:27a-26: sgrol ma'i bdag por yang dag ngas //
T02TD1906E:27a-27: tam dang mtsho skyes las byung ba //
T02TD1906E:27a-28: 'jig rten dbang phyug lce la ste //
T02TD1906E:27a-29: zla sogs 'od dpag med bzhin no /
T02TD1906E:27b-0: spyi @27b bor ri bod mtshan gzugs gnas //
T02TD1906E:27b-1: skam skyes ral gri bzang po las //
T02TD1906E:27b-2: zhal sogs don yod dang mtshungs pa'i //
T02TD1906E:27b-3: 'dren pa rnam sel spyi bo la'o //
T02TD1906E:27b-4: bla bar sam dang rdo rje las //
T02TD1906E:27b-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs brnyan can //
T02TD1906E:27b-6: snying gar kun du bzang por bshad //
T02TD1906E:27b-7: byang chub sems su rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1906E:27b-8: spyi bo'i zla bar aom las byung //
T02TD1906E:27b-9: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad las skyes pa //
T02TD1906E:27b-10: sa yi snying po dang 'dra ba'i //
T02TD1906E:27b-11: sku yi rdo rje rnam par bsgoms //
T02TD1906E:27b-12: mgrin par aa yig las padma //
T02TD1906E:27b-13: der ni aa yig las sbrul pa //
T02TD1906E:27b-14: 'jig rten dbang phyug lta bu yi //
T02TD1906E:27b-15: gsung gi rdo rje rnam par bsam //
T02TD1906E:27b-16: snying ga'i zla bar h'um yig las //
T02TD1906E:27b-17: skyes pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1906E:27b-18: sngags pas thugs kyi dbang po bsgom //
T02TD1906E:27b-19: phyag na rdo rje lta bu gzhan //
T02TD1906E:27b-20: thams cad rdo rje skyil krung can //
T02TD1906E:27b-22: mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1906E:27b-23: rang 'od shes rab lus chags ldan /
T02TD1906E:27b-24: de nas lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje bzung ste ngas gsum du bskor ba gsum byas nas de nyid gsum lan gsum gyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1906E:27b-25: dngul gyi snod malli k'a ra mig sman mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa bzhag nas gser gyi thur mas spyan dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:27b-27: aom tsakshu: aom tsakshu:sa manta tsakshu shtsakshu bri sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-28: aom badzra satva a'a:zhes pas me long bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1906E:27b-29: me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis phyogs skyong ba rnams kyang 'bad pas mchod par bya ste //
T02TD1906E:27b-32: aom ya m'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-33: aom nee rri te sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-34: aom ba ru n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-35: aom b'a ya be sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-36: aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-37: aom ai sh'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-38: aom aurdham bra hma ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-39: aom a'a dho:pri thi byee sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-40: aom be ma tsi tri bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:27b-42: de nas glu dbyangs sil snyan sogs //
T02TD1906E:27b-43: legs dkrol 'di yis bzod gsol bya //
T02TD1906E:27b-44: gang yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1906E:27b-45: lha dang de yi sras rnams dang //
T02TD1906E:27b-46: tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD1906E:27b-47: 'byung bo kun gyis bzad mdzad de //
T02TD1906E:27b-48: sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po la //
T02TD1906E:28a-2: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD1906E:28a-3: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1906E:28a-4: gang 'dir rab tu ngas gyur la //
T02TD1906E:28a-5: bskal pa 'am bskal pa brgya ru yang /
T02TD1906E:28a-6: sa chu me dang rlung rnams las //
T02TD1906E:28a-7: lha rnams kun gyis bsrung du gsol //
T02TD1906E:28a-8: slob dpon slob mar bcas pa yi //
T02TD1906E:28a-9: bu dang tsha bo 'ang srung mdzad de //
T02TD1906E:28a-10: rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis ni //
T02TD1906E:28a-11: rang ngas bzang por gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1906E:28a-12: de nas brtse ldan bla ma yis //
T02TD1906E:28a-13: slob ma bos nas 'di skad smra //
T02TD1906E:28a-14: khyod kyis sngon du gang gsol pa //
T02TD1906E:28a-15: rab ngas mchod yon mchod pa dag / de ni nga yis byas zin gyi //
T02TD1906E:28a-16: de ni ci bder mchod pa gyis //
T02TD1906E:28a-17: dri gtsang khang sogs bzhugs nas ni /
T02TD1906E:28a-18: rab sbyin nyes par 'gyur ma yin //
T02TD1906E:28a-19: aom su bra tishtha badzr'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02TD1906E:28a-20: zhes brjod de khri la sogs par bzhag nas mnyes par bya'o//
T02TD1906E:28a-21: de nas bzo bo la sogs dang //
T02TD1906E:28a-22: gzhan rnams la yang mchod par bya //
T02TD1906E:28a-23: de bzhin mgon med rnams la yang //
T02TD1906E:28a-24: sbyin pa ji ltar nus pa sbyin //
T02TD1906E:28a-25: dong dgang rab tu ngas pa la //
T02TD1906E:28a-26: 'khor lor sbyin sreg gang nus pa //
T02TD1906E:28a-27: de kun slob dpon nyid kyis zhes //
T02TD1906E:28a-28: rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs //
T02TD1906E:28a-29: sngar bzhin seng ge 'phrog byed la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1906E:28a-30: lugs ma la sogs kun kyang rab ngas bya //
T02TD1906E:28a-31: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1906E:28a-32: lha rnams kun la kun du dbang byed 'gyur //
T02TD1906E:28a-33: rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor mchog / sngags pas cho ga bzhi bsams nas //
T02TD1906E:28a-34: rdzing bu la sogs de dag rnams //
T02TD1906E:28a-35: sku'i dbang po ste chu lha'i gzugs //
T02TD1906E:28a-36: aom badzra ba ru na h'um zhes pa 'di yongs su gyur pa las klu brgyad du byas te //
T02TD1906E:28a-37: lu'i ngas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chu'i bdag nyid rdo rje'i chu lhar bltas te /
T02TD1906E:28a-38: aom badzra stva sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod do //
T02TD1906E:28a-39: rgyal bo'i dkyil 'khor ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i tshul gyis spyan drangs pa de nyid du bcug pas de nyid kyis yongs su gang ste chu'i rgyun gyis 'og gzhi'i bar khyab par bsam mo //
T02TD1906E:28b-0: de'i dbus su ngas pa de'i gzugs brnyan gyi klu klu lus gdengs ka can spyi bor 'khor lo 'dzin pa shar la @28b sogs pa'i phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su gser la sogs pa las yongs su bsgrubs pa'i klu'i dbang po rnams dngos su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1906E:28b-2: mtha' yas gser las byas pa ste //
T02TD1906E:28b-3: de bzhin nor rgyas bu dngul las //
T02TD1906E:28b-4: 'jog po zangs las byas rig bya //
T02TD1906E:28b-5: khar ba las kyang karko ta //
T02TD1906E:28b-6: de bzhin ra gan gyis padma //
T02TD1906E:28b-7: zha nye dkar pos padma che //
T02TD1906E:28b-8: de bzhin zha nyes dung skyong ngo //
T02TD1906E:28b-9: lcags las de bzhin rigs ldan yin //
T02TD1906E:28b-10: de bzhin du kun dga' rab la sogs pa rnams kyang rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa las ji lta ba bzhin du de'i rnam pas rab tu ngas par bya'o zhes pa rab tu ngas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1906E:28b-12: // / ma dran pa dang ma nus pas //
T02TD1906E:28b-13: gal te cho ga chad gyur pa //
T02TD1906E:28b-14: rab ngas byas pa'i de ma thag / sbyin sreg gis ni bskang bar bya //
T02TD1906E:28b-15: zhi dang rgyas sogs dbye ba yis //
T02TD1906E:28b-16: thabs ni rnam pa mang du bzhed //
T02TD1906E:28b-17: gzhung rgyas pa yi 'jigs pa yis //
T02TD1906E:28b-18: las kun byed pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1906E:28b-19: sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1906E:28b-20: sngon du sa gzhi sbyang bya ste //
T02TD1906E:28b-21: lag pa g-yas ni brkyang byas pa //
T02TD1906E:28b-22: rdo rjer bcas pas sal bsnun //
T02TD1906E:28b-23: aom ha na ha na badzra kro dha h'um phat /
T02TD1906E:28b-24: sa spyad ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so //
T02TD1906E:28b-25: thab zlum po rgyar khru gang pa zhabs su brkos pa sor bcu gnyis la thab kyi steng nas sor bzhi nang du dro nas de'i tshad kyis ge sar padma rgyas pa'i rnam pa can no //
T02TD1906E:28b-26: de'i phyi'i thad kar dbangs su sor bzhi pa'i stegs bu phyogs mtshams rnams rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1906E:28b-27: thab tu rang gi lha'i sa bon las byung ba ba byung gis nye bar byugs pa'i zlum po dkar po'o //
T02TD1906E:28b-28: de'i dbus su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du rdo rje dpangs su sor gcig gi tshang can dang srid du yang sor brgyad pa'i 'khor lo dang rin po che dang chu skyes dang ral gri rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:28b-29: padma'i steng phyi rol du rdo rje phreng ba byas te sngags pa shar du phyogs par gyur pas //
T02TD1906E:28b-30: aom ku sha 'di ni bzang zhing dge / dag pa'i skye ngas las dag pa //
T02TD1906E:28b-31: tshangs pa yi ni dag byed de //
T02TD1906E:28b-32: dkon mchog gsum po mnyes par byed //
T02TD1906E:29a-0: sa las skyes pa'i snying po mchog / che ge mo la zhi @29a * //
T02TD1906E:29a-2: h'um zhes pa 'dis bsngags pa'i ku sha rnams pa lang gi rna ba'i chad tsam byas nas rtse mo mdun du gug pa g-yas skor gyis thab la dag pa par bya'o //
T02TD1906E:29a-3: yang sor bcu gnyis pa'i rtsva skam po'i chun po thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste /
T02TD1906E:29a-4: de nas mchod sbyin gyi shing dang bud shing srog chags med pa thab las cung zad dma' bar byas nas shing bu ram gyi sgron me la sbar te aom dzva la dzva la h'um zhes 'don zhing thab kyi dbus su gzhug go //
T02TD1906E:29a-5: aom badzr'a na las h'a bh'u ta dzva la s'a sarba p'a pa bhismam ku ru sarba dusht'am h'um phat /
T02TD1906E:29a-6: 'dis bsngags te blugs gzar gyis mar gyi sreg blugs phul te sbar bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:29a-7: ma spar na rlung yab brdabs pas sbar par bya'o //
T02TD1906E:29a-8: de'i dbus su sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po dkar sngon dmar ba'i zhal gsum pa /
T02TD1906E:29a-9: phyag drug gis rdo rje dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin zhing rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa rin po che'i cod pan dang zla ba rdo rje can no //
T02TD1906E:29a-10: ram las byung ba sbom zhing dkar ba de lta bu'i zhal gsum pa /
T02TD1906E:29a-11: rang 'od kyi shes rab dang 'grogs shing phyag drug gis mi 'jigs pa dang bgrang phreng dang dbyug gu dang ril ba 'dzin pa /
T02TD1906E:29a-12: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa ral pa'i cod pan brtan par byas nas /
T02TD1906E:29a-13: aom tshul byon tshur byon 'byung po che //
T02TD1906E:29a-14: lha yi drang srong gnyis skyes mchog / sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas ni //
T02TD1906E:29a-15: 'dri ni yang dag bsnyen par mdzod //
T02TD1906E:29a-16: ces pas gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pas dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas thab tu ku sha'i gdan la bsnyen par byas te /
T02TD1906E:29a-17: de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i chu las ku sha'i rtse mos bsang gtor bya ba sngar bzhin dang zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil ma gtogs pa'i mchod pa la sogs pa phul nas phye ma dang bral ba'i so rtsi dbus bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:29a-19: 'dis yam shing la sogs pa la lag pa gnyis kha sbyar ba'i gung mo gnyis brkyang bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:29a-21: thams cad sbyang ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so //
T02TD1906E:29b-0: de nas lce la rdo rje @29b dkar po nas 'bras tsam bsams nas /
T02TD1906E:29b-2: zhes pas cung zad bye ba'i zhal du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:29b-3: cig sos kyis sreg blugs te /
T02TD1906E:29b-4: aom aagna ye a'a d'i pya rtstshishe ma h'a shri ye ha bya ka bya b'a ha n'a y'a mu ka sa pa ri b'a ra sya sh'int'am ku ru pum shtam ku ru raksham ku ru sv'ah'a /
T02TD1906E:29b-5: de nas dgang bzar dang blugs bzar dag kha sbyar ba'i khar me la rang gi lha'i sa bon bsam zhing me lha'i khar yang ram yig rnam par bkod de pus mo gnyis kyi nang du lag pa dag bzhag nas sreg blugs chen po dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:29b-6: de nas bgegs dang bgegs med pa'i me'i mtshan ma brtag par bya ste /
T02TD1906E:29b-7: dbang po'i gzhu 'dra dkar pa dang //
T02TD1906E:29b-8: byi ru bcas pa lta bu dang //
T02TD1906E:29b-9: rtse mo gcig pa mchog yin te //
T02TD1906E:29b-11: mdor na sgrub pa po yis ni //
T02TD1906E:29b-12: rtse gsum tha mar shes par bya //
T02TD1906E:29b-13: de ltar bgegs dang bcas shes nas //
T02TD1906E:29b-14: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1906E:29b-15: bsangs shing yang dag bsrung byas nas //
T02TD1906E:29b-16: dgang blugs gsum ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD1906E:29b-18: seng ldeng pla ksha pa la sha / au dumw'a ra nya gro dha //
T02TD1906E:29b-21: sha m'i aa shvad tha las byung //
T02TD1906E:29b-22: rtse mo'i cha las skyes gyur cing ;
T02TD1906E:29b-23: / mnyam par bcad pa mtho gang tsam //
T02TD1906E:29b-24: brlan bcas lo ma gnyis ldan pa'o //
T02TD1906E:29b-25: dri yi chu dkar gyis bkrus shing //
T02TD1906E:29b-26: mar dang mngar gsum smyugs pa nyid //
T02TD1906E:29b-27: rtse mo'i char skyes yam shing dag / gsum bdun zung du ma gyur pas //
T02TD1906E:29b-28: rtse gcig tu ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1906E:29b-29: rnying dang 'dab bral khong stong dang //
T02TD1906E:29b-30: gas dang chag dang shun pa bral /
T02TD1906E:29b-31: r/ ing dang thung dang rtse gnyis dang //
T02TD1906E:29b-32: phra dang sbom dang 'bus zos dang //
T02TD1906E:29b-33: srog chags bcas pa spang bar bya //
T02TD1906E:29b-34: aom badzra bradha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:29b-36: aom badzra la t'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:29b-38: aom badzra ya dzny'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:29b-40: aom badzra b'a tr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:29b-44: aom badzra ku bee r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:29b-46: aom badzra shr'u p'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02TD1906E:29b-48: aom sa ha k'a r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:29b-50: aom badzra shi b'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:29b-52: aom sarba to bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:30a-1: shi kha r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:30a-3: aom bo dhi bri ksha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:30a-5: aom sarba p'a pam da ta na badzr'a ya aa mu ka sya sarba p'a pam da h'a sv'ah'a /
T02TD1906E:30a-13: aom aa pra ti tat badzr'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02TD1906E:30a-14: til gyi snum dang ku sha rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1906E:30a-15: aom badzra bi dz'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02TD1906E:30a-16: gra ma med pa'i 'bras kyi so ba'i'o //
T02TD1906E:30a-17: aom badzra be g'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02TD1906E:30a-19: aom h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:30a-21: aom badzra ghasma r'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02TD1906E:30a-25: plaksha nya gro dha skyes bzang //
T02TD1906E:30a-26: aa mra dang ni seng ldeng sogs //
T02TD1906E:30a-27: yam shing rim pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1906E:30a-28: 'bras bu sogs kyang de'i thugs kar //
T02TD1906E:30a-29: yi ge gsum sbal sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1906E:30a-30: de la zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad zhal du'o //
T02TD1906E:30a-32: zho zan dang bca' ba dang zhal bsil la sogs pa phyag tu'o //
T02TD1906E:30a-37: mar me dang mchod yon mdun du dbus bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:30a-38: snga ma bzhin du mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas zhal bsil dang phye ma dang bral ba'i so rtsi phul te mchod yon la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o zhes so //
T02TD1906E:30a-39: de'i snying gar 'khor lo la sa bon la sogs pa las byung ba'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid dkar po rnam par bsams te /
T02TD1906E:30a-40: aom ae hye hi bha ga b'anni ha bha sbya sa ma ye na ts'argham pra t'i tstshe dam p'u dz'a ts'a ha nam pra s'idda me /
T02TD1906E:30a-41: zhes pas phyi rol nas de'i lus la bcug ste mchod yon la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur pa'i mchod pa la sogs pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1906E:30a-42: yi ga gsum dang spel ba'i sngags kyis yam shing la sogs par nams sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1906E:30a-43: sreg blugs cig shos kyang dbul bar bya zhing /
T02TD1906E:30b-0: zhal bsil dang phye ma dang bral ba'i so rtsi dang me tog dang bdug pa dang mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas sngar bshad pa'i gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags kyis ye shes sems dpa' nam mkhal la gshegs su gsol bar @30b bya ste /
T02TD1906E:30b-1: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharmm'a n'a m'a dya nutpanna tv'at /
T02TD1906E:30b-3: dam tshig sems dpa' bdag nyid la bcug nas bsreg rdzas lhag ma me chen por gyur pa la thams cad de bzhin du spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1906E:30b-4: der me'i mtshams su me lha manji'i steng gi snod du bzhag nas sbyin sreg gi me lhag la mar dang 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra dang ldan pa'i ts'a ru'i bza' ba thab de nyid du rang gi bdag po'i sngags bzla zhing bsgrub ste /
T02TD1906E:30b-5: aom d'i be ainna sa m'a dhe dhya na phri'i na na ne sv'ah'a /
T02TD1906E:30b-6: zhes pas gser la sogs pa'i snod du bzhag nas lha la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:30b-7: de nas slar yang manji bsal nas thab kyi nang du me lha bcug nas slob ma rnams kyi zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i ched du /
T02TD1906E:30b-8: aom badzr'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:30b-9: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1906E:30b-10: zhes pa sbyin sreg byed nas /
T02TD1906E:30b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas gsol ba yi //
T02TD1906E:30b-12: lag 'di zos pas sdig pa 'jig / ces so //
T02TD1906E:30b-13: de nas blugs gzar mar gyis gang ba lag pa g-yon dang g-yas pa'i mthe bong gis blangs nas sbyin bdag dang ldan cig bskor ba gsum byas nas snga ma bzhin du dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1906E:30b-14: zhal bsil dang phye ma dang bral ba'i so rtsi phul nas mchod yon la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD1906E:30b-15: yod kyi mchog rta dang glang po la sogs pa dbus te /
T02TD1906E:30b-16: de nas de la rab 'bad dang //
T02TD1906E:30b-17: tshig ni sngon du 'gro bas sbyin //
T02TD1906E:30b-18: aom dang bsod nams kyi nyi ma ste zla ba che ge mo dang phyogs che ge mo dang tshes che ge mo la bdag dang sems can thams cad 'khor pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod par 'dod pas rje btsun che ge mo dan rje btsun mche ge mo lhag par ngas pa dang rab tu ngas pa bgyis pa dang sbyin sreg gi las rnams kyi yon du ba lang dang 'bru dang rta dang ma he dang gser dang dngul dang sa gzhi la sogs pa dang gser gyi rin gang yin pa khyod la bdag gis yang dag par rab tu dbul po zhes so //
T02TD1906E:30b-19: de nas dril bu gsil zhing mi bskyod rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas yang dag par bstod de /
T02TD1906E:31a-0: me tog gi phur ma snyim par bzung nas gsol ba gdab @31a * //
T02TD1906E:31a-2: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02TD1906E:31a-3: nyes byas cung zad gang bgyis pa //
T02TD1906E:31a-4: gang phyir lus can skyabs gyur pa //
T02TD1906E:31a-5: mgon po khyod kyis da bzod mdzod //
T02TD1906E:31a-6: ma rnyed yongs su ma shes dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-7: ma nus gyur pas gang bgyis dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-8: bgyid du stsal ba de kun 'dir //
T02TD1906E:31a-9: thugs brtse'i rang bzhin bzod par 'os //
T02TD1906E:31a-10: zhes pas bzod par gsol te //
T02TD1906E:31a-11: yang me tog snyim par bcug nas //
T02TD1906E:31a-12: bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don //
T02TD1906E:31a-13: bsgrubs kyis bsreg bya za ba gshegs //
T02TD1906E:31a-14: ji lta'i dus su 'byon nas kyang //
T02TD1906E:31a-15: bdag las thams cad grub par mdzod /
T02TD1906E:31a-17: // /'di yis rdo rje can mnyes shing //
T02TD1906E:31a-18: ye shes me yang rab mnyes so //
T02TD1906E:31a-19: rgyal ba rtag pa mnyes pa dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-22: rta mchog bdag po mnyes 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1906E:31a-23: de bzhin tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1906E:31a-24: tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che //
T02TD1906E:31a-25: stobs chen rlung dang khyab 'jug dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-26: 'dod pa'i lha dang gshol ldan dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-27: zla ba nyi ma 'jigs pa'i gza' //
T02TD1906E:31a-28: sa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-29: lus ngan de bzhin srin po dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-30: chos kyi rgyal po dang ni klu ;
T02TD1906E:31a-31: / dri za lha min mi 'am ci //
T02TD1906E:31a-32: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa'i lha //
T02TD1906E:31a-33: 'og min du ni gnas pa dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-34: gang yang rgyal po chen por gnas //
T02TD1906E:31a-35: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas pa dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-36: 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-37: gang yang gnas gtsang nyer son dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-38: 'od zer can gyi zhing khams gnas //
T02TD1906E:31a-39: mi mjed khams su gnas pa dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-40: gling bzhi par gnas sems can dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-41: gang yang khams gsum gnas pa dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-42: rtsva lcug 'khri shing la sogs pa //
T02TD1906E:31a-43: snod kyi 'jig rten sems can dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-44: gang yang rab dga'i sar gnas dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-45: gang yang dri med pha rol son //
T02TD1906E:31a-47: mi g-yo'i go 'phang la gnas dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-48: chos sprin rjes song gang dag dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-49: gang dag sbyang dka' la gnas dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-50: ring du song bar gnas pa dang //
T02TD1906E:31a-51: 'od byed pa la gnas pa dang //
T02TD1906E:31b-0: gang dag mngon gyur gnas pa @31b dang ;
T02TD1906E:31b-1: / legs pa'i blo gros gang gnas dang //
T02TD1906E:31b-2: sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang //
T02TD1906E:31b-3: gang yang 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad //
T02TD1906E:31b-4: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang //
T02TD1906E:31b-5: bse ru lta bu rnams dang ni //
T02TD1906E:31b-6: yi dags dmyal ba dud 'gro dang //
T02TD1906E:31b-7: lha dang lha min mi rnams kun //
T02TD1906E:31b-8: sbyin sreg cho gas mnyes par 'gyur //
T02TD1906E:31b-10: nyung zhing gsal ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1906E:31b-11: rab gnas cho ga bgyis pa las //
T02TD1906E:31b-12: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs des //
T02TD1906E:31b-13: 'gro bas rdo rje 'dzin thob shog / ces pa rgya che ba'i tshig bsdus pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal k'a tsa zhabs kyis mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so /
T02TD1906E:31b-16: dri ma med pa'i mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug / chos kyi rje chen po rgyal dbang sprul sku rin po che'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' bzhin /
T02TD1906E:31b-17: zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong dharma p'a la bha dras //
T02TD1906E:31b-18: sa skyong dam pa dpon chen kun dga' bsod nams rin chen dbang gi rgyal po'i bdag rkyen las //
T02TD1906E:31b-19: bden gnas dpal ae wam chos 'khor du bsgyur ba'o//
